title: The difference between Healthy and Unhealthy Lungs
text: Besides the difference of quality of life and the ability to breathe, the difference between healthy and unhealthy lungs can be seen below:

section.title: Healthy Lungs?
section.content: Healthy lungs appear clear on an X-ray, with no signs of fluid or inflammation. They efficiently deliver oxygen to the body, enabling strong physical performance and resilience against illnesses.

section.title: Lungs with Pneumonia
section.content: Lungs affected by pneumonia often show areas of opacity or cloudiness on an X-ray, caused by fluid or infection. This condition impairs oxygen exchange, leading to symptoms like shortness of breath, coughing, and fatigue
